tasks.label: unload driver, stop snapclient
tasks.command: sudo systemctl stop snapclient ; if [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tas5805m ] && [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tas5805m/1-002e ]; then echo "1-002e" | sudo tee /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tas5805m/unbind; fi; sudo rmmod tas5805m 2>/dev/null || true; sudo rmmod snd_soc_simple_card 2>/dev/null || true;

tasks.label: load driver, start snapclient
tasks.command: sudo rmmod tas5805m 2>/dev/null || true; sudo insmod tas5805m.ko && sudo modprobe snd_soc_simple_card && sudo systemctl start snapclient
